title: Republican wins lottery-styled drawing in tied VA House race
text:
Republican wins lottery-styled drawing in tied VA House race Thursday, January 04, 2018 - 01:01 
Republican David Yancey has been declared the newly elected delegate to the Virgina statehouse after his name was drawn lottery-style from a bowl to decide a tied race with his Democratic opponent, Shelly Simonds. Rought Cut (no reporter narration).   
Republican David Yancey has been declared the newly elected delegate to the Virgina statehouse after his name was drawn lottery-style from a bowl to decide a tied race with his Democratic opponent, Shelly Simonds. Rought Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2AoFMX4
